block.name: RDS Data Source
block.doc:
This block creates the baseband (NRZ, i.e. [-1, 1]) RDS signal.
It reads its configuration from an XML file, takes as input a (float) stream at the desired sampling rate carrying a signal of 1187.5 Hz (19kHz/16, use the rds.freq_divider block to create it), and outputs a bitstream of RDS data at 1187.5bps at the same sampling rate.
